= 1.1.0 2016/07/18 =
Fix: Prevent to extend Settings Class.
Tweak: Improve invalid app name description.
Add: Remote storage settings data. Store the app request data such as email and settings url to able to generate the app automatically.
Add: Store the app request data such email and settings url to external db to able to generate the app automatically.
Add: Field description for email input type.

= 1.0.0 2016/07/08 =
First Release.
